titles.title: Eating Disorders Information and Education Act of 1993
To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of providing information and education to the public on the prevention and treatment of eating disorders.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2490)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 10/20/1993--Introduced. Eating Disorders Information and Education Act of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to mandate a program of public information and education on the prevention and treatment of eating disorders, including toll free telephone communications to provide information and referrals. Authorizes appropriations.
